channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Plugin Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Plugin Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-1088|2024-08-02T05:32:46.349Z -- unknown -- wp%20plugin%20manager
item.description: The WP Plugin Manager WordPress plugin before 1.1.8 does not have CSRF check when activating plugins, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins activate arbitrary plugins present on the blog via a CSRF attack
